original_text: The battle pressed hard against Saul, and the archers found him, and he was badly wounded by the archers.
korean_text: 사울이 패전하매 활 쏘는 자가 따라잡으니 사울이 그 활 쏘는 자에게 중상을 입은지라

sentences.original_text: The battle pressed hard against Saul
and he was badly wounded by the archers
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 궁수들에게 심하게 부상을 입었습니다
